Author: gruad
Title: [PRE-ITO] GLOBATRIX - Decentralized WEB
Body: Also, few notes about the PRE-ITO and ITO:   Our website, and home for the current token presale: https://www.globatrix.com  Current price: 1 ETH = 15000 GLOB Tier 1 Price: 1 ETH = 5000 GLOB Tier 2 Price: 1 ETH = 3000 GLOB Tier 3 Price: 1 ETH = 2000 GLOB Tier 4 Price: 1 ETH = 1500 GLOB  First 1,000,000 tokens will be sold with bonus. ETH 0.2-0.49 -> 20% bonus ETH 0.5-0.99 -> 30% bonus ETH 1+ -> 50% bonus  Bought tokens are locked to your address and can be seen straight after the purchase , but you may add the token address to the list of your tokens (especially with MetaMask wallet), the tokens will be released once the presale ends on the 15th of July, and bonus tokens will be transferred additionally between 15th and 20th of July.  Token Address: 0xbBCf10D6bc180172d8d352BE5bBCfB814E8f3474 Token ticker: GLOB Crowdsale contract address:  0xF86Ad18397738C076fC644bdebdF7a77e9Ab2fBC  The crowdsale runs on the Ethereum fork, Oracles POA Network, the purchase is done via the crowdsale contract (details further), and the tokens are emitted from the token address.  But please make sure to visit our site to complete the simple registration (in Buy Tokens section) before you proceed to the crowdsale page (there is also an alternative way to buy tokens with QR) https://wizard.oracles.org/crowdsale?addr=0xF86Ad18397738C076fC644bdebdF7a77e9Ab2fBC&networkID=1  The tokens are mintable. You can buy the tokens using the MetaMask wallet and POA crowdsale page, available from our site -OR- any wallet that supports ETH transactions with MethodID  Whitelist: NO KYC: NO   We will change the Web the way you know it today.

Author: gruad
Title: [PRE-ITO] GLOBATRIX - Decentralized WEB
Body: Also, I'm not sure that Etherscan.io will be able to link the contracts together, we're trying to though to make it more understandable.  The contracts were created through the POA.Network, but it runs on Ethereum and is a fork of Ethereum Network.  Once you buy from the crowdsale address: 0xF86Ad18397738C076fC644bdebdF7a77e9Ab2fBC  The emission and tokens locked to your wallet can be seen at GLOB token address: 0xbBCf10D6bc180172d8d352BE5bBCfB814E8f3474

Author: gruad
Title: [PRE-ITO] GLOBATRIX - Decentralized WEB
Body: Thank you for your question, French_andrey,    is this your first ITO? Will there be a Airdrop?  Yes, it's the first one. I don't think we're making an airdrop, but we're offering the pre-sale tokens at -90% price to give us the boost with the ITO, and also if we'll raise enough to get us on the exchanges before the main ITO to benefit the contributors. After the platforms launch the tokens can be also exchanged for platforms Vault coins, they won't be mined and will stand as platforms golden reserve. There are two other coins Power and Globe that will be used to reward miners, webmasters, traffic managers and sellers. The balance between different sectors will be reached through coins ratio adjustment based on algorithms.    And how will you involve users in your cyber reality?  We are building the community of people and organizations who share the common belief in the idea as we do.  The current model of the Web is competitive and controlled by third parties.  We see more and more advertisements, of course, it's a huge industry, but it results in network congestion, lost of junk data and slowdown even with updated protocols versions. Also there are information control and whole lot of other problems.  We can see the future of the Internet community and the Internet in general as decentralized, but with the current model it's not going to work.  The competition is just the way to make the third parties profit using it as the control levers for the marketing industry.  But it's the models logic.  So we offer the new model with collaborative and decentralized logic,  based on much greener flexible blockchain that doesn't exclude miners and reduced competition and monopoly.  By tomorrow I will upload the short version of the whitepaper with more diagrams for easier reading and understanding of the whole concept. But this is the idea we stand for and will make it work. With more contributions it will be easier and faster to achieve the result and finish the platform, with fewer contributions it will obviously take more time with fewer developers.  The pre-sale is on now and we made it as accessible as possible to any investor level.  Thank you for your time reading this.  Best regards, Dimitri

Author: gruad
Title: [PRE-ITO] GLOBATRIX - Decentralized WEB
Body: Thank you for your kind words, Devinsocute9zz,  Yes, we're not making the ITO for the sake of ITO and the "gold rush", especially with the Streisand effect that ICOs are having now after Google and Twitter have announced about banning the ICO websites and profiles, but these days it's the most definite way to go with the crowdfunding.  We believe in our idea and we are making Internet decentralized, Internet for the people and communities, where organizations decisions and actions are based on their communities interests and collective transparent voting, and Internet where the users will decide if they wish to see the information.  So also we came up with the harmonic advertisement methods and user preferences without cookies and decentralized search engines.  Please don't hesitate to ask any questions, we'll try to answer all of them.  Best regards, Dimitri

Author: gruad
Title: [PRE-ITO] GLOBATRIX - Decentralized WEB
Body: And another good question.  Right now we see the "gold rush" effect on ICOs, tokens, cryptocurrencies, especially as many organizations or groups are doing it for the sake of the ICO itself. And we can currently evaluate everything against the fiat currencies and economy.  And as the crypto economy gets much much stronger and much more expensive and suppresses the fiat one.  What will happen to the world's economy and all the ICOs when fiat economy will fail and there is no fiat money at all?

Author: cattano
Title: [PRE-ITO] GLOBATRIX - Decentralized WEB
Body: Cyber world is the future of technology, later it will move without the need of too many human intervention (*that is kind of hope) Being able to master technology, perhaps it would make the crypto world getting even better.

Author: gruad
Title: [PRE-ITO] GLOBATRIX - Decentralized WEB
Body: Thank you for your reply, Cattano  Even though, I believe that automatization is the way to go, where algorithms can analyze and balance the cyber world.  But not exactly the way it's offered with self-learning AI.  I see more and more ideas and documentaries where scientists say that the future of humanity is the "hive intelligence", where all of the people are connected to the same cloud with some sort of interface like implanted microchip with their brain, and minds are used as one giant computer operated by AI and society servers the purpose of hives operation ability. Of course, the human race had its flaws, wars lots of other things that have happened throughout the history, but I don't think we're a race of insects. It means there is no individuality nor personality, but there are other benefits, like the joint database of minds information.   I don't believe that is the way for the humanity to go. Not sure if you meant something else.   And certainly yes, decentralization and crypto are the future of the world.  Best regards, Dimitri

Title: [PRE-ITO] GLOBATRIX - Decentralized WEB
Body: hi, one questions from me, are you serious with this price dev ? Pre-ITO Price : 15000/ETH ITO Price         1500/ETH i see pre ITO price is about x10 from the ITO price, right ?  thank you

Author: gruad
Title: [PRE-ITO] GLOBATRIX - Decentralized WEB
Body: Thank you for your question, Cbholic.  ---------------------------------------------------------------  The roadmap:  2Q 2018 Pre-ITO (Initial Token Offering) campaigns will run in preparation for the main ITO and full-scale development of the platform.  2Q-3Q 2018 ITO STAGE & funds raising, full-scale development process, testing, marketing. Contributors will get access to the early beta version for first experience and feedback. Decentralized cross-platform browsers and communication tools development. VR interfaces development.  3Q-4Q 2018 Testing and beta-release Contributors will have access to the beta versions of platform and tools.  4Q 2018 Almost there The release of the mining tools and mining pools interfaces, online and software wallets and exchange tools, safe vaults and very first versions available to contributors.  1Q 2019 Platform release The platform will be available for free for the public download from the website and GitHub repositories  It will include: GBro browser, Globe CMS, Globe Messenger Other Interfaces: wallets, mining tools, mining pool tools, Traffic Manager, Webmaster, exchange API tools, other platform APIs.  2Q-3Q 2019 Additional tools and Business tools development Additional tools to be released, plus the tools that are used in business, collaboration, distant virtual meetings, complex data analysis, scientific research.  3Q-4Q 2019 Business tools release Most of the tools that will be free as they don't have a central point of control, but some tools will require due to the traffic usage or remote data storage.  1Q 2020 Preparing for Globatrix Operating System development Beginning of the development of Globatrix Operating System (with its own ITO)   ---------------------------------------------------------------   For more information you can also visit the website or see the whitepaper

Author: gruad
Title: [PRE-ITO] GLOBATRIX - Decentralized WEB
Body: Thank you for your question, Kang TB   Yes, 15000 tokens per 1 Ether at the pre-ITO and 1500 tokens per 1 Ether at ITO. The pre-ITO price is -90%

Author: gruad
Title: [PRE-ITO] GLOBATRIX - Decentralized WEB
Body: Thank you for your question, PatrickEClifford,  It is definitely a security.  The reason is that we wish to develop most of the tools on the platform free of charge, like the browser, the messenger, the CMS etc. There will be business tools that will be released under the platform and won't be for free, like the collaboration virtual meetings etc, but they will be rather developed and released at a later stage (in 4Q 2019), after the platform's release.  And we wish to make this project available for everyone who believes in the idea of the decentralized Internet, collaborative environment, and information freedom.   to answer your question about images: Newbie accounts can't post images  And thank you very much for your answer

Author: gruad
Title: [PRE-ITO] GLOBATRIX - Decentralized WEB
Body: Hi Everyone!  I would like to state that we have realized that current version of the whitepaper and information on the website are a bit too much and we do value your time.  It’s a large project and there is a lot to it, so it was quite hard to squeeze everything in the short form, but we’ll do our best to do so for easier understanding and time-saving.  So in a few days’ time we’ll also publish the short version of the whitepaper in more human readable form and will use more diagrams to show how it works, as well as we’ll update the information on the website.      We are running the ICO for the purpose of the projects development and further expansion, so we have combined the current pre-sale and bounty by making early tokens -90% cheaper (25,000,000) than at the main ICO price to give us the boost. As well as the minimum amount of tokens to buy is 1 token (approximately 0.026 cents) because we want to make it available to the majority who cannot make large investments.  We stand for our idea and we are building the new decentralized Internet model based on the idea of collaboration, greener and flexible blockchain, information freedom, platform and the cyber world with solutions to major problems of today's competitive model.    We value every opinion and we will try to answer all the questions, so please don’t hesitate to ask, you may join our growing community, and all together we can make this project possible.    Thank you for your time.  Best regards, Dimitri

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask  Best regards, Dimitri

Author: gruad
Title: [PRE-ITO] GLOBATRIX - Decentralized WEB
Body: Thank you very much, Dddudidd,  So do I.  Please keep in mind that there can be maximum of 25,000,000 tokens, but the tokens are released upon the purchase, so there can be less.  Minimum tokens to buy for pre-Sale is 1 (we truly wish to make it available and affordable for the majority who cannot afford large investments but still wish to be the part of the community and have access to early alpha and beta releases at the end of this year).  And also we'll release a short version of the whitepaper (hopefully by tomorrow), to make it easier to read.  Best regards, Dimitri
